channel.title: Oracle on The TechGlider
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle on The TechGlider

item.title: Week 1 at Bangalore and Work
item.description: I landed at Bangalore airport last week flying on an indiGo for the first time; found the experience better than JetKonnect from my first flight. Next day (Sunday) started early with a walk to Oracle Tech Park and back to get myself familiarized with the area before first day at work. A much-needed haircut followed. Having caught cold with the change in weather, I had to miss the Goodreads meetup planned at Brigade Road during the day, whichÂ I was eagerly awaiting to attend with a friend.
